root: ^“what is this flame or the burn in my heart?”
^again, the feeling of darkness, emptiness, and powerlessness
^*there is a bulb of light rising from the darkness*
^“is that me again. “I” is coming to me. Now, I am shaking.”
^“Well, well, well. You just can't obey what people say, don’t you?”
^“What makes you think you can step into this enchantment of mine? ”
^“Huh, there is something different about you.”
^“But still, still a boring ass of yourself. With nothing to hold, and nothing to use.”
^“they just like you, no, you are a combination of them.”
^“your pride, your wrath, your lust, and your gluttony… a monster builds from those.”
^“What a pitiful world where humans can only mourn for their desires.”
